name: Isamaru: A Samurai´s last destiny
description:
Isamaru is currently under development, any feedback on the coment section is very helpfull.

Isamaru is a 3D combat/action game where you will have to save your territory wich is under enemy attack. Pick up your sword and figth for your family and friends. Revenge is the only option, you have to end this war as your last destiny before a desease kills you. 

Isamaru is developed by: Pol Miro Dunyo, Francesc Aguilo Franch and Adrian Fuster Lorca.
